definitions: the removal of a substance from the surface of a liquid

examples.text: he recommended frequent skimming of the downwind sides of the ponds

shortDefinitions: removal of substance from surface of liquid

definitions: the action of stealing or embezzling money, especially in small amounts over a period of time

examples.text: every business owner he knows who has cash receipts does a little skimming

shortDefinitions: action of stealing or embezzling money

definitions: the action of fraudulently copying credit or debit card details with a card swipe or other device

examples.text: although the incidence of card skimming is low, you should observe precautions

shortDefinitions: action of fraudulently copying credit card details with card swipe

definitions: the action of reading something quickly so as to note only the important points

examples.text: in my skimming, I missed that
